get.summary: Get the selected onboarding plan execution.

delete.summary: Delete the selected onboarding plan execution.

post.summary: Query for compute resources representing unmanaged machines from the Provisioning service inventory.

projectId.description: Project identifier the plan will onboard machines to.

endpointIds.description: Cloud account identifiers to lookup for discovered machines.

projectId.description: Project identifier the plan will onboard machines to.

endpointIds.description: Cloud account identifiers to lookup for discovered machines.

name.description: Deployment name. Will be propagated to Cloud Assembly deployment.

description.description: Deployment description. Will be propagated to Cloud Assembly deployment.

name.description: Deployment name. Will be propagated to Cloud Assembly deployment.

description.description: Deployment description. Will be propagated to Cloud Assembly deployment.

consumerDeploymentLink.description: Link to the onboarded deployment in Cloud Assembly.

resourceLink.description: Link to the compute resource (machine) in the Provisioning service inventory.

resourceName.description: Resource name, usually the machine name. Will be propagated to Cloud Assembly.

tagLinks.description: Tag links in the Provisioning service inventory associated with the machine.

resourceLink.description: Link to the compute resource (machine) in the Provisioning service inventory.

resourceName.description: Resource name, usually the machine name. Will be propagated to Cloud Assembly.

tagLinks.description: Tag links in the Provisioning service inventory associated with the machine.

name.description: Name of the auto-generated Cloud Template.

autoGenerate.description: Automatically generate the Cloud Template if set.

templateLink.description: Link to an existing Cloud Template.

name.description: Name of the auto-generated Cloud Template.

autoGenerate.description: Automatically generate the Cloud Template if set.

templateLink.description: Link to an existing Cloud Template.

planLink.description: Link to the plan to execute.
Link to a plan. Clients need not set this field, as it is automatically taken care of by the DeploymentBulkCreatorService

deploymentLink.description: Link to an existing deployment. Only set this field when adding resources to an existing deployment.

name.description: Desired deployment name. If omitted, a name will be automatically generated

resources.description: List of resources to be created

createBlueprint.description: Indicates whether onboarding should generate a Cloud Template for this deployment.

link.description: Link to the compute resource (machine) in the Provisioning service inventory.

name.description: Resource name, usually the machine name. Will be propagated to Cloud Assembly.

tagLinks.description: Tag links in the Provisioning service inventory associated with the machine.

planLink.description: A link to the parent plan to associate the new onboarding deployments with.

resourceLink.description: A link to the onboarded machine to unregister from Cloud Assembly.
A link to the unregistered machine.
